details.description: Jobseekers can find a job using the Jobcentre Plus job search tool - also find voluntary work to gain new skills to help your job search
details.introduction: Jobseekers can search for full or part-time jobs and voluntary work by location, title, or category. This includes jobs in Great Britain and abroad, but not in Northern Ireland.
details.will_continue_on: the jobs and skills search site
details.alternate_methods:
Get help finding a job from the Jobseeker Direct service from Jobcentre Plus.

Jobseeker Direct

Telephone: 0845 606 0234
Textphone: 0845 605 5255
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm

details.description: Includes job search, volunteering, apprenticeships and job offers
Includes holidays and finding a job
How to become an apprentice – qualifications, pay and training, take on an apprentice - funding, employer grants and NAS

related.title: Help with moving from benefits to work

details.description: Support and services from Jobcentre Plus to help you leave benefits and start work - work programme, work clubs, starting a business, volunteering, work experience, help with drug or alcohol problems, support for carers

related.title: Your rights and safety when looking for a job

details.description: Help and advice on finding a job including where to look and safety when looking for a job
